name: intersection
desc: intersection is a powerful module that incorporates some of the characteristics of plume_volume, yet allows for any number of volumetric sequential (serial) subsetting operations.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Map Components
properties.desc: The Map Components value allows the user to select which data components to include in the output after the subsetting has completed.

properties.name: Map Cell Components
properties.desc: The Map Cell Components value allows the user to select which cell data components to include in the output after the subsetting has completed.

properties.name: Output String
properties.desc: The Output String contains the name(s) and value(s) of the intersection subsets.

properties.name: Above Output String
properties.desc: When the Include Region is set to Above, the Output String will use this string as its identifier.

properties.name: Output String Delimiter
properties.desc: When the Output String consists of All Subsets, the Delimiter is the string occuring between each subset text.

properties.name: Below Output String
properties.desc: When the Include Region is set to Below, the Output String will use this string as its identifier.

properties.name: Subset List
properties.desc: The list of intersections to create.

properties.name: Max Edge Angle
properties.desc: The Max Edge Angle angle is defined as the angle between two faces or cells in the model.

properties.name: Color By
properties.desc: The Color By control allows the user to set how the color of the output should be determined.
